name: gigo
description: Upscale lazy, typo-ridden prompts into highly technical specifications

gigo.apiKey.description: API key for OpenAI or Anthropic (fallback when vscode.lm is unavailable)
gigo.apiKey.markdownDescription: API key for OpenAI or Anthropic. Only used when the built-in Language Model API is unavailable.

gigo.apiProvider.description: Which API provider to use for the fallback
gigo.apiProvider.markdownDescription: Which API provider to use when falling back to external APIs.

gigo.model.description: Model identifier (e.g., gpt-4o, claude-sonnet-4-20250514). Leave empty to use provider default.
gigo.model.markdownDescription: Model identifier for the fallback API. Leave empty to use provider defaults (`gpt-4o` for OpenAI, `claude-sonnet-4-20250514` for Anthropic).

gigo.systemPrompt.description: Custom system prompt for upscaling. Leave empty to use the built-in default.
gigo.systemPrompt.markdownDescription: Custom system prompt for the LLM. Leave empty to use the built-in default. The user's input will be appended after this prompt.

gigo.historySize.description: Number of original prompts to keep in history for restoration.
